ASteCA¶

Article:ASteCA: Automated Stellar Cluster Analysis (A&A, 2015)
Site:asteca.github.io
Source:github.com/asteca
Documentation:asteca.rtfd.org

This is the manual of operation for the Automated Stellar Cluster Analysis (ASteCA) package.

Warning

This documentation is in the process of being written and is not yet finished. Updates will be made as versions are released. Last updated: Aug 25, 2015.

Important

A PDF version of this manual can be downloaded here.
